member.name: F:ModularMotion.UIMotion.OnBegin
member.summary: Triggers UnityEvent on the beginning of the animation

member.name: F:ModularMotion.UIMotion.OnEnd
member.summary: Triggers UnityEvent at the ending of the animation

member.name: F:ModularMotion.UIMotion.Keyframes
member.summary: A list of keyframes in this component

member.name: F:ModularMotion.UIMotion.Frame
member.summary: Get current frame in this component

member.name: M:ModularMotion.UIMotion.Play
member.summary: Play animations between two frames. (Trigger Ex. Open,Close)

member.name: M:ModularMotion.UIMotion.PlayFromStartTillEnd
member.summary: Play animations from the start regardless what frame is currently on.

member.name: M:ModularMotion.UIMotion.PlayAll
member.summary: Play animations from the start to the end. (if Ping-Pong wrap mode selected, it will go back and forth)

member.name: M:ModularMotion.UIMotion.PlayAllForward
member.summary: Play next animation to the end of frame. (Recommend to use with Ping-Pong wrap mode)

member.name: M:ModularMotion.UIMotion.PlayAllBackward
member.summary: Play previous animation to the end of frame. (Recommend to use with Ping-Pong wrap mode)
